name: Dragon Slayer - Ludum Dare 40 Compo
description:
Made for LUDUM DARE 40 
Theme: The more you have the Worse it is

Fight Dragons and Collect gold. The more gold you have the stronger and more numerous the Dragons get.

Controls: 
Mouse 1 ( Left Click) charges a shot, launches when let go.

W S A D - Movement

Find the Ludum Dare page here. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/dragon-slayer
